title: Bug 18934: Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
OB: In the ImageAnalyzer example, when opening a small image like an icon, the scrollbars are enabled and can be moved, but they do not have any effect. This is misleading as the scrollbars do not do anything.
EB: The scrollbars in the ImageAnalyzer example should be disabled when opening a small image.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Build F2 (20020602) on Redhat 7.2 with GTK2KDE 2.210 (GTK2 only)
2. Open the ImageAnalyzer example
3. Notice that the scrollbars are enabled and can be moved, but they do not have any effect
4. Open a small image, such as an icon
5. Observe that the scrollbars are present but do not have any functionality, making them misleading
